GENERAL

Avinashilingam University: Two-day seminar on Digital India, 10 a.m.; Reflections of Union Budget 2016 by Commerce and Economics Department, 10 a.m.

Kalaignar Karunanidhi Institute of Technology: Workshop, 9 a.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: Seminar, 9.00 a.m.; Workshop, 10 a.m.

NGP Arts and Science College: Post-Budget Analysis, 10 a.m.

CMS College of Science and Commerce: Campus Recruitment Drive, 9.30 a.m.

Sri Krishna College of Technology: National Conference on IOT and Cloud Computing, 9.00 a.m.

RVS College of Arts and Science: “Commercia” 2016, 10 a.m.

VLB Janakiammal College of Arts and Science: Lecture on Troubleshooting, 10 a.m.

Karpagam Academy of Higher Education: Sports Day, 2.30 p.m.

Sri Shakthi Institute of Engineering and Technology: Power Puff Girls, 6 a.m. onwards

KTVR Knowledge Park: Technical Symposium ZOTSICE 2K16, 9.30 a.m.

title: Coimbatore today
